title: Scholar Athlete of the Week: Heritage's Lillie Castleman - Oct. 8
text:
Scholar Athlete of the Week: Heritage's Lillie Castleman - Oct. 8 
By Eric Dutkiewicz - 21Alive October 8, 2015 Updated Oct 8, 2015 at 11:39 PM EDT 
MONROEVILLE, Ind. (21Alive) - The 21Alive/Parkview Sports Medicine Scholar Athlete of the Week for Oct. 8 is Heritage High School senior Lillie Castleman. 
Castleman plays volleyball for the Lady Patriots. She's also a member of the National Honor Society, student council and Tech Fest team. 
Digital Daily â€“ subscribe to our daily newsletter 
She earns a 4.0 grade point average in the classroom, and is set to be valedictorian. 
While she has not chosen a college, she is leaning towards Ball State University; and plans to study education.   To submit a comment on this article, your email address is required.
